name: Stirrings Blood Orange Bitters
description:
Blood Orange Bitters are made without alcohol. This makes them more palatable, versatile, and blendable.

Derived from herbs, roots, fruit, or plants, bitters are used to flavor cocktails and give them “body.” Serious mixologists and cocktail lovers consider them a defining ingredient in cocktails. Stirring's Blood Orange Bitters are the first to incorporate blood oranges with a secret blend of exotic ingredients, creating a mellower yet still powerful taste that's a little sweeter than other bitters. A modern interpretation of a classic.


TRIPLE-FILTERED WATER, CANE SUGAR, GENTION EXTRACT, BLOOD ORANGE EXTRACT AND OTHER NATURAL FLAVORS, CITRIC ACID, CARAMEL COLOR.

name: Sonoma Syrup # 28 Classic Grenadine
description:
No. 28 Classic Grenadine is antioxidant rich using over 45% pure pomegranate juice. 

This new twist on the classic grenadine makes a healthy signature cocktail or the childhood favorite Shirley Temple or Roy Rogers. 

No fake stuff.. food colorings, or garbabe, just good flavor.

name: Sonoma Syrup #29 Sweetened Lime Juice
description:
Direct from the Sonoma region of California, SOnoma Syrup No. 29 Sweetened Lime juice is a combination of Key and Persian lime juice
Forget the artificial flavors and additives. This is our favorite lime juices to use while we are in a hurry. Offers the right tartnedd to any cocktail.

Ingredients: Pure cane sugar, lime juice and Key lime juice from concentrate, filtered water, vitamin C (ascorbic acid), citric acid, natural lime and Key lime extract, vanilla extract, sea salt.
